alert.note: Alert for Centre; Clinton; Lycoming; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 12:30AM EDT until July 14 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CENTRE...EASTERN CLINTON...SOUTHWESTERN LYCOMING AND WEST CENTRAL UNION COUNTIES... At 1230 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hyner to Waterville to Woodward, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jersey Shore, Carroll, Avis, Dunnstown, McElhattan, Waterville, R.B. Winter State Park, Cammal, Little Pine State Park, Loganton, Oval and Salladasburg. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Lock Haven and Mile Run exits, specifically from mile markers 180 to 195. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
